CU Blockchain Summit Sponsorship Guide

About the Event

We are extremely excited to announce the first annual CU Blockchain Summit coming to the Idea Forge on the CU Boulder campus this April 14th and 15th! The conference will feature talks, workshops, and panels all day on both Saturday and Sunday. The event will include a 24 hour hackathon dedicated to building dApps, solving security bounties, and other blockchain hacks. Started by the CU Blockchain club, the conference is the first time we are bringing together the greater Colorado student blockchain community. Students will be attending from CU Boulder, Colorado School of Mines, CU Denver, and Colorado State University, making it the largest blockchain-focused gathering of students in Colorado ever.

Building off the success of EthDenver, the focus on the event is to catalyze the growth of blockchain development among students in Colorado. The event is primarily educational, allowing even beginners to start working with blockchain tech, build dapps, and securely own coins. Throughout the event we will be hosting workshops focused on teaching students about new technologies in the ecosystem along with panels from blockchain experts. This makes the CU Blockchain Summit a unique opportunity to educate some of the youngest blockchain contributors about your company.

Sponsors at the event will receive access to our community in a variety of ways. All sponsors will receive branding at the event along with in-person access to the student blockchain community. We are also offering opportunities to host talks and workshops, host a challenge at the hackathon and present a bounty, and recruiting and interview opportunities. More details below.

Why Sponsor?

  • Receive access to untapped talent in the CU Boulder Blockchain community
  • Present your project or field of study directly to the youngest blockchain developers around the globe
  • Opportunity to expand your team through recruiting
  • Chance to organically grow your community
  • Demo your API's and products to hundreds of eager developers
  • Get meaningful feedback on your company's technology and business strategies
  • Gain brand recognition and build positive perception for your brand
  • Allows mentors to assist hackers in integrating your API or technology into their products

Sponsorship Tiers

We also accept fiat currency as sponsorship. If this is something your company is interested in, please contact us at blockchain@colorado.edu.

Bronze

Price: $500 USD

Perks:

  • Send 1 representative
  • Access to all participant emails
  • Distribute swag
  • Have your logo on our website
Purchase Bronze Tier

Silver

Price: $1500 USD

All of the Bronze tier perks plus

Perks:

  • Send 2 representatives
  • Host a talk, workshop, or panel
  • Booth at the event
  • All opt-in participants resumes and Linkedin profiles
Purchase Silver Tier

Gold

Price: $2500 USD

All of the Silver tier perks plus

Perks:

  • Unlimited representatives
  • Two tables at the event
  • Sponsor a challenge or bounty
  • Remarks at opening ceremonies
Purchase Gold Tier

Powered By

Price: $5000 USD

All of the Gold tier perks plus

Perks:

  • 10 minutes at opening and closing ceremonies for remarks
  • Two or more workshops on your platform
  • Unlimited recruiters and the ability to interview students at the event
  • All offical branding subtitled "powered by [your company]"
Purchase Powered By Tier
